name: Lizard Guy Platformer V2.4
description: I have not updated Lizard Guy Platformer on itch.io for a long time. And that is clear to see, now that the latest version is 2.4. Lizard Guy Platformer is a game about a flying lizard trapped in a virtual world. He is trying to escape. Help him please because he is cute like look at him. There are currently 5 worlds, a secret world, and 4 endings.
